quest.name: Cannot Say Neigh
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened has concerns of an equestrian nature.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Find the Namazu horse enthusiast in Nhaama's Retreat.
Mount the horse, and ride it to the Mol horse handler.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: A fellow festival enthusiast volunteered to return one of the horses the Mol so graciously provided for our racing event, but I fear his “enthusiasm” is rather greater than his horsemanship...

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: To be perfectly blunt, he is an atrocious equestrian, and there is a distinct possibility that either he or the mount will be injured.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: I would greatly appreciate it if you could find our would-be horse wrangler, and ensure the bodily integrity of both parties. Pray begin your search on the outskirts of Dhoro Iloh─I consider it extremely unlikely he has managed to travel more than a few dozen yalms beyond the Towering Still.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03118
dialogue.text: The Mol make it look so easy. Effortless. I thought I could just leap on its back, and gallop off across the steppe. But, no. No, no, no...

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03118
dialogue.text: I don't know if I nudged the wrong spot or what, but we were suddenly racing down the side of the cliff! My entire life flashed before my bulging eyes!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03118
dialogue.text: Practice makes perfect, or so they say. ...They wouldn't say that if they saw my attempts at riding horses.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03118
dialogue.text: I did my best not to nudge the beast the wrong way, but once again I found myself hurtling down the cliffside at a breakneck pace. How fortunate that I have little neck to speak of, let alone break!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03118
dialogue.text: It might be best if I retire before I steer myself into a Matanga lair...

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03118
dialogue.text: Please, would you ride the horse for me? Yes, yes?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03118
dialogue.text: A Mol horse handler was to meet me halfway. “Just follow the course of the river to the north,” Seigetsu said. Sounds simple enough, doesn't it...?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03118
dialogue.text: Oh, hello. When I saw the horse return alone, I was worried you'd been snagged by one of those long-toothed cats. Well, our Mol friend will be waiting, so it's back in the saddle for you! So to speak.

dialogue.name: DAILYMOL03118
dialogue.text: Do those stunted creatures even know how to ride...?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Speak with the Namazu horse enthusiast in Nhaama's Retreat to mount a horse, and then deliver the animal to the Mol horse handler.

dialogue.name: DAILYMOL03118
dialogue.text: ...You are returning one of our horses? I expected a Namazu rider, but to be honest, I am somewhat relieved.

dialogue.name: DAILYMOL03118
dialogue.text: Hah, did you see it race away!? The poor beast must have been homesick for Mol Iloh!

dialogue.name: DAILYMOL03118
dialogue.text: I thank you for returning our animal in fine health. Pray send my regards to Seigetsu and his kin.

dialogue.name: DAILYMOL03118
dialogue.text: The horse will find its way home, worry not. Feel free to make your own way back to the Namazu.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: <sigh> As expected, you were forced to salvage my shortsighted─and shortlimbed─kin's duty. I did try to dissuade him from his course...

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: In any case, my perspicacity in assigning your tasks has been borne out once again.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, however, our enthusiast's zeal is as unrelenting as my intellect, and he is surely doomed to repeat these ill-considered horseback disasters. In such an event, your assistance will once more be welcome.
